body_text: Here is the body text. Maybe later I will have to convert this to an array or something, or somehow escape or find and replace linebreaks or whatever. For the time being, I am doing it in a very simple and dumb way of storing the entire thing as just a continuous string rather than anything more complicated. This might change in the future, but this is a complicated project so I have to keep it simple to start off with.
